p: Data for ILI in the U.S. were collected from the Fluview database of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention in the U.S. The agency’s website ( https://gis.cdc.gov/grasp/fluview/fluportaldashboard.html) provides both new and historical data. The CDC’s ILI is freely distributed and available through ILInet [ 17]. From this website, we can obtain the CDC’s dataset on weighted ILI (%).
